11.content:
Shawn and Hunter are brothers in high school, Shawn is 17 while Hunter is 15, the two of them are desperate to find a date to the upcoming school dance

Hunter throws his phone across the room "Nope nothing"
"Great another dance with no dates, it doesn't help that for every girl at our school theres like two guys, every girl is already taken, what the hell?"said Shawn
Hunter lays down on the bed "Its just torture, I hate walking through that halls seeing everyone making out"
"I know right? Its so awkward walking seeing everyone dating, can't get anyone to even talk to you at this point, and seriously what gives? Were not ugly?"
"I'm at most a 7, your about an 8, so yea what gives"
"I don't get it, do we need to join a sports team or something?"
"Shawn, what happened last time I played sports" Hunter shoots him a stern look
"Oh my god man let it go, your acting like you died" Shawn said
"My dignity and pride did, I didn't deserve to get lit on fire because I dropped a pass" Hunter whined

"Have any other ideas?"

135.content:
Working his brush back and forth across his find. Adam knew he was onto something special. Each stroke revealing more and more of the artefact. Simon watched avidly over his shoulder, both terrified to damage the ancient item. It was clearly a comb, and from the gilt details holding the teeth in place, clearly an impressive piece and a high-status artefact.

Each brush of the bristles revealed more, and both men held their breath. Adam petrified that he'd damage it, while Simon kept expecting to see some damage, a snapped spine on the comb, or missing teeth.

However, it looked virtually perfect. As if it were merely covered in dust, rather than four thousand years old. Eventually, the other end was revealed, and Adam let loose a gasp that he hadn't realised he was holding in. The last dust and sand billowed as he exhaled.

The hieroglyphs confirmed it was Queen Niratitti's personal comb. Cautiously, he picked it up. It felt substantial and solid. Adam looked about, as if expecting the world's press to leap out from behind some sand dune to capture the moment. He resisted the urge to see how strong the spine was by bending it.

"It's for holding hair in place, rather than tidying it." Simon observed.

Adam nodded his agreement, it was too short, and the teeth long and thick. Simon ruffled Adam's hair, "We did it!" he said, shifting to patting him on the back.

As Adam left the disappointing store, he was hiding a smile a mile wide. While Jack was already looking for somewhere more entertaining to go.

"Fancy a coffee, Adam?" he asked, spotting a nearby stand.

"Yeah, sure..." he answered, "Besides, I've something to show you." he added in a low whisper, casting a furtive glance back to the magic shop they'd just left.

A sly, slight opening of his jacket revealing the half-shadowed inside, and Jack guessed some stolen item.

"For God's sake..." Jack said, more agitated, and glancing back to the same door. Already expecting an outraged owner to erupt forth and accuse them of theft.

"They only had junk..." He said, "Just drop it in the trash can. I don't want to be caught stealing... let alone for something that's cheap tat."

Barely noticing the time Stephanie was soon suited and booted. Rising from the sofa to stand, she felt like Bambi as her ankles wobbled, and ached as she fought to keep upright. However, a few tentative, unsteady steps up and down the living room got her more comfortable.

She was blind to how it added to the appeal of her ass, or how upright she stood, and accentuated her bust too. Stephanie as Harley posed and pouted to her reflection as she decided which she'd take with her to the party.

https://66.media.tumblr.com/a64ac7077844...

The baseball bat, felt too mundane, though she loved the heft of it. Swinging it, there was a satisfying -whiff- of displaced air.

https://66.media.tumblr.com/9fd699a43103...

The gun felt right in her hands, but there was something about it she didn't like. Unable to put her finger on the issue, Stephanie tried the mallet last. Keep the best to last was her thought. Swinging it back and forth, it was pleasingly heavy, and Harley-ish, too. She knew this was what she needed. It just completed her outfit.

https://66.media.tumblr.com/b578d00db901...

A quick glance to the clock told Steve... Stephanie... Harley that they'd need to head off soon to get there on time.
15511111.title: Aleena completes the look.
